org.nineml.coffeefilter.util

Class EventBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nineml.coffeegrinder.parser.TreeBuilder
      • org.nineml.coffeefilter.util.EventBuilder

  • public class EventBuilder
extends org.nineml.coffeegrinder.parser.TreeBuilder
    This class transforms the output of a successful ixml parse into XML.
